member.summary: Gets or sets the name of the task. This is the name of the actual file that defined this task.

member.summary: Gets the repository to which this task belongs.

member.name: P:Dynamicweb.Indexing.Repositories.Tasks.Task.Start
member.summary: Gets or sets the start time. DateTime.MinValue indicates no start time, meaning it's active always, or until any specified end time.

member.name: P:Dynamicweb.Indexing.Repositories.Tasks.Task.End
member.summary: Gets or sets the end time. DateTime.MaxValue indicates no end time, meaning it keeps repeating until actively stopped.

member.name: P:Dynamicweb.Indexing.Repositories.Tasks.Task.RepeatInMinutes
member.summary: Gets or sets the repeat interval (in minutes).

member.name: P:Dynamicweb.Indexing.Repositories.Tasks.Task.Type
member.summary: Gets or sets the type of the underlying. Must be specific enough so it can be resolved using the Type system.

member.name: P:Dynamicweb.Indexing.Repositories.Tasks.Task.TypeName
member.summary: Gets or sets the type of the underlying. Must be specific enough so it can be resolved using the Type system.

member.name: P:Dynamicweb.Indexing.Repositories.Tasks.Task.Parameters
member.summary: Gets or sets the parameters needed for the underlying task type.

member.name: P:Dynamicweb.Indexing.Repositories.Tasks.Task.LastExecutionTime
member.summary: Gets the last execution time. The value represents the last time this task was executed. If the task was never run, or if it's currently running the value is null.

member.name: P:Dynamicweb.Indexing.Repositories.Tasks.Task.LastExecutionSuccessful
member.summary: Gets the last execution successful. The value indicates whether the last execution was successful. If the task was never run, or if it's currently running the value is null.
